@Machiavelli1 - Allow me to apologize and correct myself. After some thought it occured to me that you might be right....so I downloaded this torrent to see what problem you were having. Indeed you were right, it would not extract no matter which of the options you chose - use 7zip to unzip instead of WinRAR, extracted it should come out to about 4,588,544KB but will show that it's 4.37GB. Mounted with UltraISO....the label is Hazard_10.6.6. Hopefully you hadn't deleted the torrent download yet :)
kma1 tnx for this , but already deleted and im using hazard 10.6.6 ! :) TNX again ! :)

I downloaded this and like other users the ISO appeared to be empty. I tried it in windows and the install files were there. I managed to get the loader started (by changing the startup disk in windows) and I got the warning "this is a windows intel install, don't install on a mac!"

So, THIS IS NOT FOR MAC COMPUTERS, THIS IS A PC INTEL INSTALL DISK.

What a waste of time!
If you are having issues extracting this, try renaming every part, including the file inside to something smaller, or you can try extracting to your C drives root (Easiest Option), it worked for me.
